data.actual_result: An error message with a wumpus appears instead. When pressing back the app seems to function normally again, but you can see a NullPointerException message in the debug screen
data.expected_result: it should display the recent mentions in landscape mode
data.short_description: A mysterious error occurs if you rotate your screen while viewing Recent mentions
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Recent mentions screen - Rotate the screen
